alert.note: Alert for East Baton Rouge; Iberville; Northern Livingston; Western Ascension (Louisiana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued September 07 at 5:25PM CDT by NWS New Orleans
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northwestern Ascension, west central Livingston, eastern Iberville and south central East Baton Rouge Parishes through 600 PM CDT... At 525 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Shenandoah, or near Denham Springs, moving south at 10 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Baton Rouge, Denham Springs, Oak Hills Place, St. Gabriel, Prairieville, Westminster, Old Jefferson, Village St. George, Inniswold, Shenandoah, Gardere and Merrydale. This includes the following Interstates... Interstate 10 in Louisiana between mile markers 159 and 171. Interstate 12 between mile markers 1 and 13. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: East Baton Rouge; Iberville; Northern Livingston; Western Ascension
